meaning_str.bing:
n. 信心；信任；相信；宗教信仰
int. 真
网络. 信念；忠实；诚信

信心；信任；相信；宗教信仰

信仰；信心；信任；忠诚；确信；（某一）宗教；宗教信仰；信条；教义；坚定的信念
确实；真正；的确；毫无疑问；真诚地相信

sogou-kaoyan.n: 信任; 信赖; 信心[出现3次)];信仰; 信条[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.n: 信任; 信心[出现9次)];信仰; 宗教信仰[出现3次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 信任; 信赖; 信心[出现2次)];信仰; 信条[出现0次)]

1.en: Return the children to use in good faith to pay the U. S. , we sweat to shape a young soul.
1.cn: 孩子们用真诚回报着我们的付出，我们用汗水塑造着稚嫩的灵魂。

2.en: As a woman, a mother and a wife, I hold sacred for some specific values and oaths. I choose this faith to proceed with my life.
2.cn: 作为一个女人、一个母亲和一个妻子，有某些特定的价值观和誓言是我所尊崇的。我选择以这一信念继续我的人生道路。

3.en: You see that his faith and his actions were working together, and his faith was made complete by what he did.
3.cn: 可见信心是与他的行为并行，而且信心因著行为才得成全。

0.en: I know you, Lane. Somewhere along the line you had a crisis of faith.
0.cn: 我了解你，莱恩，一直徘徊在道德边界，你有了信仰危机。

1.en: In Interstellar, crew members take a giant leap of faith when they plunge into a Wormhole.
1.cn: 在《星际穿越》中，宇航员进行了巨大的信仰飞跃，就在他们陷入虫洞时。

2.en: He's my pastor. He's the head of Campus Faith. He was supposed to pick up some reading plans.
2.cn: 妈妈，他是我的牧师，他是"校园信仰"的负责人，他本该来拿我的阅读计划的。

3.en: Faith is an integral part of local life. Everywhere you go you'll smell the scent of incense wafting from shrines.
3.cn: 信仰是当地生活的重要一环。无论走到何处，您都可以嗅到从庙宇中散发出来的香烛气味。

4.en: Why won't you place faith in a diplomatic solution?
4.cn: 你为什么不肯相信外交手段？

5.en: You have that much faith in me, do you? More faith than you have in me, it seems.
5.cn: 你对我还真是有信心啊。看来比你对我的信心要大。

6.en: I have faith because of Divid and Francine Wheeler. I have faith because of Michael and Harris Stoltenberg. And I have faith because of you.
6.cn: 我的信心来源于大卫与法兰欣·威勒夫妇。我的信心来源于迈克尔与哈里斯斯图坦伯格兄弟，我的信心来源于在座的各位。

7.en: I have no faith in the UN anymore. I do have faith in my ability to negotiate with this man.
7.cn: 我现在对联合国已经不抱希望了。但我相信我可以跟此人谈妥。

8.en: Then have faith you made the right choice, sir. Whatever faith I have is quickly evaporating.
8.cn: 那就相信你做出了正确的决定，先生。我的信念正在迅速地消失殆尽。

9.en: Don't you see? I had to make you lose faith in me so you could learn to have faith in yourself.
9.cn: 还不明白吗？我故意让你们不要寄希望于我，这样你们才能学会对自己有信心。

10.en: Really? That's what you think? So, you'll put your faith in some random seniors you just met, but you don't have faith in me?
10.cn: 真的吗？你真是这样想的吗？所以你对一些你刚随机遇到的高年级学生有信心，但是你却对我没信心？

11.en: Do you really think this will work? I have faith in him.
11.cn: 你认为这样真的有效吗？我对他有信心。

12.en: What if you just have too much faith in people? What if I have exactly the right amount of faith in people? Bird. How am I a triangle with that?
12.cn: 或者说你只是对人太过信任了呢？那如果我对别人的信任就是对的呢？那边有只鸟，我跟她怎么组成铁三角？

13.en: I'm gonna say 3-D. That'll let her know the studio has faith in it.
13.cn: 还是说3D电影吧，可以让她知道制片方对电影很有信心。

14.en: There is no call we do not answer; there is no faith that we betray.

15.en: To convince me to honor our arrangement? To take a leap of faith, yes.
15.cn: 要我遵守协议。没错，冒险一试。

16.en: But it only makes me more determine to prove I'm worthy of your faith.
16.cn: 但这更坚定了我的决心，向您证明我值得您信任。

17.en: Remember this. You may loose your faith in us, but never in yourselves.
17.cn: 记住，你们可以对我们失去信心，但千万别对自己失去信心。

18.en: An act of faith. One I hope you will repeat in the future in Starfleet.
18.cn: 我只是坚持我的信念，希望你今后在星舰服役的时候也能坚持住。

19.en: There's not a lot of faith there, which is strange after a 102 win season.
19.cn: 上赛季赢了一百零二场还没信心，这也太奇怪了。
